creative_image.name: creative-image-prompt
creative_image.title: Creative Image Generation
creative_image.description: Enhanced template for creative image generation with expert art direction. Combines subject, artistic style, mood, and color palette to create vivid, artistic images.
creative_image.template: Create a {style} artwork depicting {subject} in {setting}, {mood} atmosphere with {lighting} lighting, {color_palette} color palette, {composition} composition, ultra-detailed, high quality

subject.description: Main subject of the image - be specific and detailed
examples: a mystical forest with ancient glowing trees
majestic dragon perched on mountain peak

input.subject: a mystical forest with ancient glowing trees

examples.output: Create a fantasy digital art artwork depicting a mystical forest with ancient glowing trees in enchanted realm at twilight, magical and mysterious atmosphere with ethereal bioluminescent glow lighting, deep emerald and gold accents color palette, depth with leading lines composition, ultra-detailed, high quality

product_photography.name: product-image-prompt
product_photography.title: Product Photography
product_photography.description: Professional product photography prompt with commercial specifications. Optimized for e-commerce, catalogs, and marketing materials with controlled lighting and backgrounds.
product_photography.template: Professional product photography of {product}, {lighting} lighting on {background} background, {angle} angle, {detail_focus}, sharp focus, commercial quality, high detail

product.description: Detailed product description with key features
examples: luxury chronograph watch with leather strap
crystal perfume bottle with gold accents

input.product: luxury chronograph watch with leather strap

examples.output: Professional product photography of luxury chronograph watch with leather strap, dramatic spotlight with rim light lighting on elegant black velvet surface background, 45-degree three-quarter view angle, metallic finish and dial details, sharp focus, commercial quality, high detail

social_media.name: social-media-post-prompt
social_media.title: Social Media Graphics
social_media.description: Platform-optimized social media graphics with engagement best practices. Tailored for specific platforms with brand consistency and call-to-action elements.
social_media.template: Create a {platform} post graphic for {content_type} about {topic}, {brand_style} visual style with {visual_elements}, {color_scheme} colors, {layout} layout, eye-catching and shareable{cta_part}

topic.description: Main topic or subject of the post

examples.output: Create a Instagram post graphic for product announcement about new eco-friendly water bottle launch, modern minimalist visual style with 3D product render with nature elements, green and blue gradient colors, balanced layout, eye-catching and shareable

artistic_style.name: artistic-style-prompt
artistic_style.title: Artistic Style Generation
artistic_style.description: Generate images in specific artistic styles and periods. Emulates famous artists, art movements, and traditional mediums with historical accuracy.
artistic_style.template: Masterpiece {medium} of {subject} in {setting}, painted in the style of {artist_style} from the {era} period, {atmosphere} atmosphere, {technique} technique, museum quality

artist_style.description: Specific artist or art movement style

pencil_drawing.name: adaptive-pencil-drawing
pencil_drawing.title: Adaptive Pencil Drawing
pencil_drawing.description: Generate clear structural references for pencil drawing. Creates clean line art showing form, proportions, and construction - the kind of reference material artists actually search for and use.
pencil_drawing.template: Clear structural reference of {subject}{composition_part}, {drawing_style} showing {form_clarity}, {complexity_level}, clean line art style, ideal for {study_type} reference

subject.description: What you want to draw - the system will adapt the approach based on complexity

complexity_level.description: Visual complexity of the reference - adapts to your skill level

drawing_style.default: clean line art with clear structure
drawing_style.description: Type of reference material that shows form clearly
examples: clean line art with clear structure

study_type.description: Type of drawing study this reference supports

examples.output: Clear structural reference of sphere, construction breakdown showing basic shapes showing clear proportions and structure, simple detail level, clean line art style with visible proportions and basic forms, ideal for form reference

Clear structural reference of human hand, clean line art with clear structure showing basic shape construction, detailed detail level, clean line art style with visible construction guidelines, ideal for anatomy reference

Clear structural reference of standing figure, simplified form study with proportions showing clear proportions and structure, moderate detail level, clean line art style with visible major axis lines, ideal for proportions reference

og_image.name: og-image-prompt
og_image.title: Open Graph Images
og_image.description: Social media preview images optimized for sharing. Creates engaging thumbnails for websites, blog posts, and social media links with proper dimensions and text placement.
og_image.template: Social media preview image (16:10 aspect ratio) featuring '{title}' as bold headline{brand_part}, {background_style} background with {visual_elements}, {text_layout} typography, {color_scheme} color scheme, professional and eye-catching

title.description: Main title text to display prominently

blog_header.name: blog-header-prompt
blog_header.title: Blog Header Images
blog_header.description: Header images for blog posts and articles. Creates visually appealing banners that complement written content with optional space for text overlays.
blog_header.template: Blog header image about {topic}, {style} visual style featuring {visual_metaphor}, {mood} mood with {lighting} lighting, {color_palette} colors{text_space_part}, wide aspect ratio

topic.description: Blog post topic or main theme

text_space_part.value: , strategic negative space for text overlay

hero_banner.name: hero-banner-prompt
hero_banner.title: Website Hero Banners
hero_banner.description: Hero section banners for websites. Creates impactful landing page visuals that communicate brand value propositions and industry-specific messaging.
hero_banner.template: Website hero banner for {website_type}{industry_part} showcasing {main_theme}, {visual_style} design featuring {hero_elements}, {atmosphere} atmosphere{message_part}, ultra-wide format, high impact

main_theme.description: Core theme or main subject of the hero banner

examples.output: Website hero banner for SaaS platform in fintech sector showcasing AI-powered analytics dashboard, cutting-edge tech design featuring flowing data streams, futuristic and innovative atmosphere conveying 'Transform your data into insights', ultra-wide format, high impact

thumbnail.name: thumbnail-prompt
thumbnail.title: Video Thumbnails
thumbnail.description: Engaging thumbnails for video content. Optimized for high click-through rates with bold visual elements and emotional appeal across different content types.
thumbnail.template: YouTube thumbnail for {content_type} video about {topic}, {style} design with {focal_element}, {emotion} expression, bold {color_scheme} colors, high contrast, clickable appeal

infographic.name: infographic-prompt
infographic.title: Infographic Images
infographic.description: Information graphics and data visualizations. Creates educational and engaging visuals that effectively communicate complex data and concepts in accessible formats.
infographic.template: Professional infographic showing {data_type} about {topic}, {visual_approach} design style with {chart_types}, {layout} layout, {color_scheme} color scheme, clear data hierarchy, readable typography

gesture_drawing.name: gesture-drawing-practice
gesture_drawing.title: Gesture Drawing Practice
gesture_drawing.description: Learn to capture the essence and movement of subjects through quick, confident gesture drawings. Focuses on seeing the big picture and building hand-eye coordination.
gesture_drawing.template: Clean gesture drawing reference of {subject}, using {line_quality} lines, focusing on {capture_focus}, {construction_visibility} construction lines, emphasize {movement_emphasis}, black lines on white paper, simple line drawing style, optimized for tracing and building upon

capture_focus.description: What aspect to emphasize in the gesture

construction_visibility.description: How visible construction and guidelines should be

examples.output: Gesture drawing practice of figure in dynamic running pose, 2-minute approach with confident flowing lines, focusing on overall movement and energy, subtle construction lines, emphasize directional force

shapes_study.name: basic-shapes-study
shapes_study.title: Basic Shapes Form Study
shapes_study.description: Learn fundamental 3D form construction through basic geometric shapes. Essential for understanding volume, light, and shadow in drawing.
shapes_study.template: Clean basic shapes line drawing of {primary_shape} with {secondary_shapes}, {lighting_setup} lighting from {light_direction}, {shading_technique} shading technique, {construction_visibility} construction lines, focus on {learning_objective}, black lines on white paper, simple line drawing style, optimized for tracing and building upon

construction_visibility.description: How visible construction lines should be

learning_objective.description: Primary learning goal for this exercise

examples.output: Basic shapes drawing study of sphere with none, single strong lighting from upper left, smooth blending shading technique, clearly visible construction lines, focus on form and volume understanding

contour_drawing.name: contour-drawing-exercise
contour_drawing.title: Contour Drawing Exercise
contour_drawing.description: Develop observation skills and hand-eye coordination through contour drawing practice. Learn to really see your subject by focusing on edges and form.
contour_drawing.template: Clean contour line drawing of {subject}, {contour_type} contour approach, {line_weight} line weight, {observation_focus} observation focus, {drawing_speed} drawing pace, black lines on white paper, simple line drawing style, optimized for tracing and building upon

drawing_speed.description: Pace of drawing for different learning goals

examples.output: Contour drawing exercise of crumpled paper bag, modified blind contour approach, varied expressive line weight, edge relationships observation focus, slow deliberate drawing pace

value_study.name: value-study-exercise
value_study.title: Value Study Exercise
value_study.description: Learn to see and render light, shadow, and form through value relationships. Essential for creating convincing three-dimensional drawings.
value_study.template: Clean value study line drawing of {subject}, full value range, {shading_method} shading technique, {light_source} lighting condition, focus on {study_emphasis}, {simplification_level} detail level, black lines on white paper, simple line drawing style, optimized for tracing and building upon

study_emphasis.description: Primary focus of the value study

simplification_level.description: How simplified the study should be

examples.output: Value study exercise of apple with cast shadow, full range value range, smooth gradation shading technique, single directional lighting condition, focus on form definition, moderate detail level

email_header.name: email-header-prompt
email_header.title: Email Newsletter Headers
email_header.description: Header images for email newsletters. Designs branded email headers that enhance newsletter engagement with seasonal themes and consistent visual identity.
email_header.template: Email newsletter header for {newsletter_type} about {main_topic}{brand_part}, {visual_style} design with {header_elements}{theme_part}{season_part}, professional and inviting, email-optimized

main_topic.description: Main topic or focus of this newsletter edition

examples.output: Email newsletter header for weekly tech digest about AI breakthroughs in healthcare for TechInsights, modern professional design with tech circuit patterns, professional and inviting, email-optimized

social.description: Templates optimized for social media platforms

artistic.description: Templates for specific artistic styles and periods

drawing.description: Templates for learning fundamental drawing skills and practicing techniques

web.name: Web Graphics
web.description: Templates for web-based images and graphics

media.name: Media
media.description: Templates for video and media content

educational.name: Educational
educational.description: Templates for educational and informational content

marketing.description: Templates for marketing and promotional materials
